text:
Hey Guys, our team was wondering if there is something like a HubSpot test/sandbox environment where we can take new features for a spin. I was on this page but it only leads me to a normal free HubSpot account. Or am I missing something?
<https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>
Hey <@UHA0L28CW>. Thanks for helping. Could you be so kind and help me understand your screenshot?

In your HubSpot portal go to Marketing -> Website -> Website pages (or Landing pages) and in the left sidebar you will find More tools, a dropdown that has Content staging inside.
By clicking on content staging, you will see the list of your pages with the Stage button on the side (right)
I think you want to test building template or modules
You can create account there for dev work
